title: Australia's Afterpay Touch says not part of RBA review of payments firms
text:
Australia's Afterpay Touch says not part of RBA review of payments firms

Stock Markets 12 minutes ago (Oct 21, 2019 10:14)

© Reuters. Australia's Afterpay Touch says not part of RBA review of payments firms Oct 21 (Reuters) - Afterpay Touch Group Ltd is not currently a part of the Australian central bank's review of surcharging practices in the payments industry, the company said on Monday. "Afterpay is not currently subject to an RBA (Reserve Bank of Australia) inquiry or review process," the buy-now-pay-later firm said in a statement.

Australia's Afterpay Touch says not part of RBA review of payments firms
